name: Botty Bird
description:
Hilarious parody game where you guff instead of flap as Botty Bird takes to the skies to foul his way to victory.

Poor Botty Bird has wings so small they do not provide enough lift so he must fart from his ample botty to manoeuvre the obstacles in his way in this endless runner flappy game.

Such exertions can take their toll though and young Botty Bird will unfortunately follow through and poop from time to time, which may put you off your jump timings as you cry tears of laughter.

Great fun for everyone!
